job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Your Role • Working closely in partnership with Engineering to maximize availability, operability, scalability, performance, and reliability of services by leveraging our deep understanding of our applications and end-to-end flows with expertise in infrastructure • Application and infrastructure on call / site up issues for production and non-production • Building, deploying, and scaling systems across on-premises datacenters • Operability and availability design, readiness, and review • Design operations automation and tooling to improve the reliability of our services and infrastructure • Capacity planning and management for disaster recovery and resiliency • Application and infrastructure monitoring, alerting, and dashboards • Security best practices, patching, and hygiene • Drive incident and problem management and analysis   You   have • Confirmed experience supporting internet-facing production services and distributed systems • Solid programming experience in Python, Golang, or similar • Expertise in operating Linux-based systems, with a solid understanding of its internals • Experience running Docker-based workloads in production • Experience in container orchestration platforms like Nomad or Kubernetes • Experience with hardware or software based load balancing solutions (e.g. Netscalers, nginx, etc.) • Experience with APMs, Splunk, Grafana, or similar monitoring tools • Terraform, Puppet, or other configuration management tools • Demonstrated problem solving ability, utilizing creative and innovating thinking, but also adhering to a strong sense of ownership, customer service, and integrity • Experience partnering and collaborating very closely with engineering and platform teams • Excellent communications skills • Ownership mindset, self-driven, and quick learner
